original_text: And the Lord did according to the word of Moses; and the frogs died out of the houses, out of the villages, and out of the fields.
korean_text: 여호와께서 모세의 말대로 하시니 개구리가 집과 마당과 밭에서부터 나와서 죽은지라

sentences.original_text: And the Lord did according to the word of Moses
and the frogs died out of the houses
